Study.Description: Name of the study: Citation - Experiment - Subgroup.

No_brain_m.Description: Mean agreement rating for no-brain-image condition.

Brain_m.Description: Mean agreement rating for brain-image condition.

Included_Critique.Description: Whether a critical commentary was included in the study or not.

Levelts.Critique: article included critical commentary on conclusions
Levelts.No_Critique: article did not include critical commentary on conclusions

Medium.Description: The medium in which the experiment was conducted.

Compensation.Description: Notes on compensation provided to participants.

Participant_Pool.Description: Notes on where participants were recruited.

yi.Description: Raw mean difference, calculated as Brain_m - No_brain_m.
